## TextureSampleGrad.validate() method

Validates the node state and input type compatibility

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected validate(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Error message if invalid, empty string if valid

## Remarks

Validation ensures: - Both inputs are connected - Texture input is a valid texture type - Coordinate input matches texture dimensionality
